data.name: Hack Grid - Master Levels
data.detailed_description:
More Levels, More Challenge

The Master Levels adds a new chapter to the game and bring 40 new challenging levels that will test your mastery of Hack Grid. These levels combine the puzzle elements of the original game and its free content update Firewall.


Can you overcome the challenge that the Master Levels provide?

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1746910/Hack_Grid__Master_Levels/
data.about_the_game:
More Levels, More Challenge

The Master Levels adds a new chapter to the game and bring 40 new challenging levels that will test your mastery of Hack Grid. These levels combine the puzzle elements of the original game and its free content update Firewall.


Can you overcome the challenge that the Master Levels provide?

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1746910/Hack_Grid__Master_Levels/
data.short_description: Want more challenge? Then you'll love Master Levels for Hack Grid! The Master chapter combines the unique puzzle elements of the original game and the free content update Firewall into 40 challenging but fair levels that will test your wits.
data.supported_languages: English, German, Czech, Dutch, Finnish, Russian, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Graphics: Support for OpenGL 2.1
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Graphics: Support for OpenGL 3.3
